00020 #ifndef TLM_CORE_TLM_EVENT_FINDER_H_INCLUDED_
00021 #define TLM_CORE_TLM_EVENT_FINDER_H_INCLUDED_
00022 
00023 #include "tlm_core/tlm_1/tlm_req_rsp/tlm_1_interfaces/tlm_tag.h"
00024 
00025 namespace tlm {
00026 
00027 template <class IF , class T>
00028 class tlm_event_finder_t
00029   : public sc_core::sc_event_finder
00030 {
00031 public:
00032 
00033     // constructor
00034 
00035     tlm_event_finder_t( const sc_core::sc_port_base& port_,
00036                         const sc_core::sc_event& (IF::*event_method_) ( tlm_tag<T> * ) const )
00037         : sc_core::sc_event_finder( port_ ), m_event_method( event_method_ )
00038         {}
00039 
00040     // destructor (does nothing)
00041 
00042     virtual ~tlm_event_finder_t()
00043         {}
00044 
00045     virtual const sc_core::sc_event& find_event( sc_core::sc_interface* if_p = 0 ) const;
00046 
00047 private:
00048 
00049     const sc_core::sc_event& (IF::*m_event_method) ( tlm_tag<T> * ) const;
00050 
00051 private:
00052 
00053     // disabled
00054     tlm_event_finder_t();
00055     tlm_event_finder_t( const tlm_event_finder_t<IF,T>& );
00056     tlm_event_finder_t<IF,T>& operator = ( const tlm_event_finder_t<IF,T>& );
00057 };
00058 
00059 
00060 template <class IF , class T>
00061 inline
00062 const sc_core::sc_event&
00063 tlm_event_finder_t<IF,T>::find_event( sc_core::sc_interface* if_p ) const
00064 {
00065     const IF* iface = ( if_p ) ? dynamic_cast<const IF*>( if_p ) :
00066                                  dynamic_cast<const IF*>( port().get_interface() );
00067     if( iface == 0 ) {
00068         report_error( sc_core::SC_ID_FIND_EVENT_, "port is not bound" );
00069         return sc_core::sc_event::none;
00070     }
00071     return (const_cast<IF*>( iface )->*m_event_method) ( 0 );
00072 }
00073 
00074 } // namespace tlm
00075
